story.title: Our History
content: RAIA was born after two students from USP SÃ£o Carlos, Pedro Augusto Ribeiro Gomes and Pedro Kenzo Muramatsu Carmo, visited Germany and learned about the TUM AI group, an independent organization recognized as an AI catalyst in Germany.
Inspired by the success of TUM AI, they decided to create a similar initiative in Brazil, focused on the development of Artificial Intelligence that could have a high impact on Brazilian society.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To advance Artificial Intelligence in Brazil and transform the country into a protagonist in the field.

values.title: What We Believe In
values.subtitle: RAIA operates on five strategic pillars that guide all our activities and projects.

items.title: Impact Projects
items.description: Development of real AI solutions, both in collaboration with industry and academia, as well as in entrepreneurial initiatives.

items.title: Events and Conferences
items.description: Connections, presentations, and discussions among professionals, academics, and leaders in the AI sector.

items.title: Creation of Scientific and Educational Content
items.description: Dissemination of technical knowledge, promotion of research, and publication of discoveries.

items.title: Talent Development
items.description: Polishing of young talents, both in technical capabilities and leadership.

items.title: Community
items.description: Creation of a collaborative environment where the main players in the Artificial Intelligence ecosystem can exchange knowledge, support each other, and grow together.

purpose.title: Why We Exist
purpose.content:
RAIA (Network for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence) is a non-profit organization committed to transforming Brazil into a global protagonist in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Through technical projects with real impact, events, education, and talent development, RAIA promotes technological innovation and trains leaders prepared to face the challenges of the future.

AI is a revolutionary force of transformation, capable of generating social and economic progress. Our mission is to bring together the best emerging talents and provide an environment where they can grow, collaborate, and contribute to solutions that positively impact the country and position Brazil as one of the world leaders in the field.
